# Editor placeholder

Works just like a standard textarea field placeholder

```js
Jodit.make('#editor', {
	/**
	 * Show placeholder
	 */
	showPlaceholder: true,

	/**
	 * Use a placeholder from original input field, if it was set
	 */
	useInputsPlaceholder: true,

	/**
	 * Default placeholder
	 */
	placeholder: 'start typing text ...'
});
```
